```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
raw_df <- read.csv("ai4i2020.csv") %>% 
  data.frame()
str(raw_df)
```

```{r}
raw_df %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(Air_temperature, HDF)) +
  geom_point() +
  ylab('Machine Failure Label') + 
  xlab('Air Temperature [K]') + 
  ggtitle("Machine Learning Failure Prediction with Air Temperature [K]") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```
